physical_appearance: This is a container of ointment. It is green with white inscriptions, and circular in shape. The brand 'Star & Ring Brand' is inscribed on the cover. There is a picture of a star with a ring attached to it in the front. The cover is largely stained and rusty.
sgcool_label_text: This container of ointment was likely used to lubricate the embroidererâ€™s hands or the needle to facilitate the task of embroidery. It was of the Star & Ring Brand and sold by Chee Min Chinese Medical Hall. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses, working from home as she did not have a shop.
subject_terms_2: Ointments Peranakan (Asian people) Sewing Equipment and supplies Tailors Clothing trade Lubrication and lubricants
